p: Nucleotide sequences were aligned using Clustal Omega ( www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools). Phylogenetic trees were constructed and molecular evolutionary analyses were conducted using MEGA 6.0 software. The Kimura-2 correction parameter model and Maximum likelihood method were applied to construct the phylograms of VP7, VP4, and VP6. The best-fit models were determined through testing the model parameter. Tree robustness was determined by bootstrapping (1,000 replicates), with bootstrap values >70% considered significant.
